page.title: 10FORESTRY OF DUNECHT ESTATE
page.content: There are many different types of trees on the estate such as beech,oak sycamore,birch etc.Round the loch are willows and elders and along the roads,horse_chestnut.The most common tree is{Scot's pine}but this is changing to{spruce}and{Douglas fir } because they grow faster.Trees are grown from seed at the nursery on the estate and the forestry covers 93 hectares. Mr Fraser is the head forester and has 20 men working with him nursery_men, saw_men etc.On average he works 40 hrs per week.Trees that go to the{sawmill} are used for{building and fencing. } There are many different kinds of {wild_life}to be found in the forests, namely badgers,fox,roedeer,rabbits, mice etc.and a variety of birds.To {protect young plantations},fencing is put round.Fire and wind are a problem.
